org.asterope.healpix
Class PixTools

java.lang.Object
  org.asterope.healpix.PixTools
Direct Known Subclasses:
PixToolsNested
public class PixTools
extends java.lang.Object

contains methods translated from HEALPix Fortran90 with increased map resolution in comparison to original Fortran code.

Is thread safe.

Author:
N Kuropatkin

          default constructor

Method Detail

query_strip

public LongRangeSet query_strip(long nside,
                                double theta1,
                                double theta2)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
finds pixels having a colatitude (measured from North pole) : theta1 < colatitude < theta2 with 0 <= theta1 < theta2 <= Pi if theta2 < theta1 then pixels with 0 <= colatitude < theta2 or theta1 < colatitude < Pi are returned

Parameters:
nside - long the map resolution parameter
theta1 - lower edge of the colatitude
theta2 - upper edge of the colatitude
Returns:
LongList of pixel numbers (long)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

query_polygon

public LongRangeSet query_polygon(long nside,
                                  java.util.ArrayList<PixToolsVector3d> vlist,
                                  long inclusive)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
finds pixels that lay within a CONVEX polygon defined by its vertex on sphere

Parameters:
nside - the map resolution
vlist - ArrayList of vectors defining the polygon vertices
inclusive - if set 1 returns all pixels crossed by polygon boundaries
Returns:
LongList of pixels algorithm: the polygon is divided into triangles vertex 0 belongs to all triangles
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

query_triangle

public LongRangeSet query_triangle(long nside,
                                   PixToolsVector3d v1,
                                   PixToolsVector3d v2,
                                   PixToolsVector3d v3,
                                   long inclusive)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
generates a list of pixels that lay inside a triangle defined by the three vertex vectors

Parameters:
nside - long map resolution parameter
v1 - PixToolsVector3d defines one vertex of the triangle
v2 - PixToolsVector3d another vertex
v3 - PixToolsVector3d yet another one
inclusive - long 0 (default) only pixels whose centers are inside the triangle will be listed, if set to 1 all pixels overlaping the triangle will be listed
Returns:
LongList with pixel numbers
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

Returns:
- LongList of long

query_disc

public LongRangeSet query_disc(long nside,
                               PixToolsVector3d vector,
                               double radius,
                               boolean inclusive)
generates in the RING or NESTED scheme all pixels that lays within an angular distance Radius of the center.

Parameters:
nside - long map resolution
vector - PixToolsVector3d pointing to the disc center
radius - double angular radius of the disc (in RADIAN )
inclusive - boolean false (default) only pixels whose centers lay in the disc are listed, if set to true, all pixels overlapping the disc are listed. In the inclusive mode the radius is increased by half the pixel size. In this case most probably all neighbor pixels will be listed even with very small radius. In case of exclusive search and very small radius when the disc lays completely inside a pixel the pixel number is returned using vector2pix method.
Returns:
LongList of pixel numbers calls: RingNum(nside, ir) InRing(nside, iz, phi0, dphi,nest) vector2pix(nside,ipix)

pix2ang_ring

public double[] pix2ang_ring(long nside,
                             long ipix)
renders theta and phi coordinates of the nominal pixel center for the pixel number ipix (RING scheme) given the map resolution parameter nside

Parameters:
nside - long map resolution
ipix - long pixel number
Returns:
double[] theta,phi

Returns:

InRing

public LongRangeSet InRing(long nside,
                           long iz,
                           double phi0,
                           double dphi)
returns the list of pixels in RING or NEST scheme with latitude in [phi0 - dpi, phi0 + dphi] on the ring iz in [1, 4*nside -1 ] The pixel id numbers are in [0, 12*nside^2 - 1] the indexing is in RING, unless nest is set to 1

Parameters:
nside - long the map resolution
iz - long ring number
phi0 - double
dphi - double
Returns:
LongRangeSet with results
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Modified by N. Kuropatkin 07/09/2008 Corrected several bugs and make test of all cases.

InRing

public void InRing(long nside,
                   long iz,
                   double phi0,
                   double dphi,
                   LongRangeSetBuilder res)
returns the list of pixels in RING or NEST scheme with latitude in [phi0 - dpi, phi0 + dphi] on the ring iz in [1, 4*nside -1 ] The pixel id numbers are in [0, 12*nside^2 - 1] the indexing is in RING, unless nest is set to 1

Parameters:
nside - long the map resolution
iz - long ring number
phi0 - double
dphi - double
res - store result in this builder
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Modified by N. Kuropatkin 07/09/2008 Corrected several bugs and make test of all cases.

Ang2Vec

public PixToolsVector3d Ang2Vec(double theta,
                                double phi)
calculates vector corresponding to angles theta (co-latitude measured from North pole, in [0,pi] radians) phi (longitude measured eastward in [0,2pi] radians) North pole is (x,y,z) = (0, 0, 1)

Parameters:
theta - double
phi - double
Returns:
PixToolsVector3d
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

Npix2Nside

public long Npix2Nside(long npix)
returns nside such that npix = 12*nside^2, nside should be power of 2 and smaller than ns_max if not return -1

Parameters:
npix - long the number of pixels in the map
Returns:
long nside the map resolution parameter

Returns:
npix long the number of pixels in the map
